page.title: 17FEARNVILLE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: A new recreational amenity in this area is the Fearnville Sports Centre. It offers plenty of facilities both indoors and out. The centre is open every day from 9 am to 10.30pm and is used by over 10,000 people each week. It offers training in various activities and sports. Indoors there is a swimming pool, sports hall, squash courts and an exercise room. There is a lounge bar which is available for private hire. Outdoor activities are also well catered for. There is a full size astro-turf football pitch which is floodlit at night, 6 tennis courts, 1 netball court, 2 bowling greens and the 2nd largest BMX track is used by children who ride specially strengthened bicycles over the bumpy track and also perform amazing feats of daredevil riding.
